_source.short_desc: Easy to set up and customizable 360 Feedback for organizations of all sizes. Get a demo with a 360 Expert to see Spidergap in action.
_source.long_desc: Whether you're looking for a 360-degree feedback tool that's ready to use out-of-the-box or you'd prefer to customize the entire process, Spidergap offers features and pricing that support your next steps. Spidergap is for organizations that want to provide their leaders with modern 360-degree feedback reports that are easy to review and action while still customizable. Arrange a free demo with a 360-degree feedback expert to decide if Spidergap will work for you.
_source.pricing_details:
Pricing is calculated based on the number of employees receiving feedback.

For example:

10 employees receiving feedback: $89 per employee/year
25 employees: $79 per employee/year
50 employees: $69 per employee/year
100 employees: $56 per employee/year
250 employees: $44 per employee/year
1000 employees: $22 per employee/year

As low as $12.50 per employee/year. Use our pricing calculator at https://www.spidergap.com/subscriptions

Spidergap offers a 15% discount for charities and academic users.
_source.target_audience: Spidergap is for organizations looking for an easy-to-use tool that provides actionable 360 Feedback. More than 2500 customers in 134 countries have delighted their leaders with Spidergap feedback.

category_features.name: Anonymous Feedback
category_features.definition: Allow reviewers to provide anonymous feedback to encourage honest conversations

category_features.name: Continuous Feedback
category_features.definition: Provide ongoing performance feedback to employees on a regular basis, rather than giving feedback at designated times

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: View statistics and metrics about a document on a dashboard or by exporting a file

category_features.name: Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on how each task or process has advanced since its initiation

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Rater Selection
category_features.definition: Select specific number and type of reviewers to provide feedback for an individual/participant (e.g. peers, supervisors, etc.)

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Applicant Tracking
category_features.definition: Find and manage potential candidates and their applications and resumes through the recruiting life cycle

category_features.name: Benefits Management
category_features.definition: Record employee's benefit plans and selections throughout career progression

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Employee Database
category_features.definition: Electronic storage of staff contact information and job status

category_features.name: Employee Profiles
category_features.definition: Create and view customizable employee profiles to track important information (e.g. job title, manager, contact info, etc.).

category_features.name: Onboarding
category_features.definition: Process of familiarizing new stakeholders with the company, a new location, or a service

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Recruitment Management
category_features.definition: Tools to find, attract and asses potential candidates for open job positions within a company

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Time & Attendance
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee's work hours to improve payroll accuracy

category_features.name: Time Off Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee time-off, vacation, and sick leave requests

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Competency Management
category_features.definition: Catalog, manage, and develop employee skill sets

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tools, processes, and management that support the experience of employees throughout their time at a company

category_features.name: Goal Setting / Tracking
category_features.definition: Establish measurable goals and objectives to be tracked and reviewed within a specific time frame

category_features.name: Individual Development Plans
category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.definition: Process of familiarizing new stakeholders with the company, a new location, or a service

category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Recruitment Management

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Bonusly is the recognition, engagement, and rewards platform employees love. It practically runs itself, so you'll love it, too.
related_products.features: At Bonusly, we're on a mission to help people connect with their work and each other in meaningful ways. With the use of our powerful employee recognition and rewards platform, we believe every organization can build high-performing, deeply engaged teams. Bonusly features fun and easy peer-to-peer recognition that incorporates your company values, a platform and integrations that make participation effortless, and an international reward catalog with gift card, cash out, and donation options.

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager.
related_products.features: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager. It works by combining employee engagement, continuous performance management, and manager effectiveness software with education, services, and community. At the heart of our approach is Best-Self Management, an evidence-inspired strategy for cultivating world-class managers and transforming organizations by unlocking every employee's potential.

related_products.short_desc: We give HR a simplified, automated workflow to easily set-up and analyze performance reviews.
related_products.features: ClearCompany is the easiest way to bring all of your employee review processes into a single, automated solution. Our easy-to-use software allows you to quickly set up reviews, including custom scoring tables, weighted sections, and free-form responses. Sections of reviews can be shared among multiple forms to further simplify setup and scoring. And, our flat-rate pricing allows you to send as many reviews as you need, as frequently as you need to, without worrying about the price tag.

related_products.short_desc: Learn how leading midsize companies motivate and engage employees with 360 degree feedback software. See a free demo today!
related_products.features: Motivate and engage employees with Trakstar's 360 degree feedback software. Unlimited online performance reviews, automated workflows and reports. Manage performance reviews easily across hundreds or thousands of employees in your organization. Learn how leading mid size companies use Trakstar to increase employee engagement, streamline goal management and create an environment of real-time feedback to drive business growth. See a free demo today!

related_products.short_desc: Factorial streamlines HR processes for every stage of the employee life cycle so HR can focus on what really matters.
related_products.features: Factorial is a powerful human resources software that employees love almost as much as HR does. With a simple, intuitive interface, Factorial streamlines HR processes at every stage of the employee life cycle. Making recruitment, onboarding, time tracking, time-off management, and performance reviews easy. HR managers have enough to do! Make admin more efficient so you can concentrate on the things that really matter.

related_products.short_desc: A powerful employee survey tool that helps you measure employee engagement, boost performance and improve company morale.
related_products.features:
Make better decisions with detailed insights.

Vantage Pulse is a powerful employee survey system that helps employers get a detailed and real-time insight about employee engagement levels within the organization. The survey tool comes preloaded with different question sets from 30+ categories for deriving meaningful and actionable data for improving the employee experience. It also gives the employers complete autonomy to decide the frequency of surveys.

related_products.short_desc: The most professional survey software for your company HR department. Create, send and analyse result for 180 / 270 and 360 surveys.
related_products.features:
The most professional survey software for your company. Create, send and analyse result for 180 / 270 and 360 surveys. 

Our world class support is here to help you with your project. You can either email us or schedule an online demo session.

related_products.short_desc: Engage & Collaborate Virtually using Insights performance tool. Teams can manage, track and collaborate on their goals and initiatives.
related_products.features: Best suited for companies with 200-2,000 employees. Best fit for industries with salary-based positions. Insights is an all-in-one platform that will make your company a better place to work. Insights offers a holistic view of your overall performance. Our tool promotes team collaboration through virtual ongoing conversations and helps employees manage their responsibilities, goals, core values and 360 feedback. Recognized and trusted by our customers as simple to use and cost effective.

related_products.short_desc: CheckMarket's online survey software is the quickest and easiest way to get the right questions in front of the right people.
related_products.features:
Enterprise survey software to monitor employee experience (EX) and engagement across the entire lifecycle. Close the loop with shareable reports, dashboards, alerts and follow-up tools. Import your organization's hierarchy and other data and then use them in report filters and shares. Create self-service forms that trigger surveys and reports automatically.
Clients include L'Oreal, Toyota, Citibank, Q8, Heineken, Sony, Manpower, ...

similar_products.short_desc: Qualtrics Employee Experience empowers organizations collect, analyze and act on 360 feedback from managers, peers, and direct reports.
similar_products.features: If one point of view is valuable, multiple points of view can be transformational. 360 feedback helps employees gain both broad and deep insights on their performance from a wide range of professional contacts. And with Qualtrics tools, the feedback process couldn?t be simpler: Automate multi-rater feedback for simpler, faster questionnaires and easier data processing. Develop high-performing employees and stronger teams with Qualtrics 360 feedback. Request a Live Demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Implement a flexible & fully automated 360-degree feedback review process with the Blue People Insight platform
similar_products.features:
The Blue People Insight platform gives you the flexibility to build the 360-degree review process that's right for your organization. 

AUTOMATION - Advanced integration capabilities with your organization's information systems.

FLEXIBILITY - Handle your most complex 360-degree feedback scenarios.

EFFICIENCY - Centralize your 360-degree evaluation process, including monitoring 

ANALYTICS - Provide powerful reports & insights to all roles and levels in your organization, quickly.

similar_products.short_desc: From fast-growing start-ups to the Fortune 500, Culture Amp is designed to help build an employee experience your people will love.
similar_products.features:
With Culture Amp, prioritize and deliver impactful programs across employee engagement, performance management, and development - all in one intuitive platform. You can help managers, individuals, and teams reach their full potential with action-oriented 360? feedback. Discover how 6,000+ companies, including Salesforce, Unilever, and PwC use our trusted data, tools, and partnership to create a culture of feedback and drive business success. 

Get a demo at CultureAmp.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Affordable web-based solution with customizable questionnaires, automated email reminders and quick sign-up process. Try it for free.
similar_products.features:
An affordable and easy-to-use performance management solution. It brings together performance appraisals, goal tracking, 360-degree feedback and opinion surveys into one simple and integrated platform. 
Capture feedback from colleagues, managers and subordinates to get a broader view of every employee's skills, competencies and behaviors. Primalogik simplifies and automates your 360 feedback survey process. Try it for free. Get started in seconds with minimal configuration required.

similar_products.short_desc: We give HR a simplified, automated workflow to easily set-up and analyze performance reviews.
similar_products.features: ClearCompany is the easiest way to bring all of your employee review processes into a single, automated solution. Our easy-to-use software allows you to quickly set up reviews, including custom scoring tables, weighted sections, and free-form responses. Sections of reviews can be shared among multiple forms to further simplify setup and scoring. And, our flat-rate pricing allows you to send as many reviews as you need, as frequently as you need to, without worrying about the price tag.

similar_products.short_desc: Lattice is the way engaged, high-performing teams do 360 degree reviews and real-time feedback to build a winning culture.
similar_products.features: Lattice integrates 360 degree feedback into a people management platform that gives People Leaders solutions to build engaged, high-performing teams. They empower HR teams to make more strategic, data-driven business decisions and build winning cultures through continuous performance management and rich employee engagement insights. Find out why 1,850+ companies trust Lattice for people management.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful 360 Degree Leadership Surveys offering ready-to-go templates that can also be customized to fully meet your leadership goals
similar_products.features: MultiRater Surveys has been designed to assist L&D consultants, executive coaches & HR professionals to maximize leadership capability and employee engagement. This powerful online people analytics  platform not only provides a range of template surveys (including 180, 360 & Pulse Leadership, Employee, Board and Customer surveys) but also the capability to customize questions to create fully personalized surveys that will deliver the required data for leadership and organizational growth.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast Mirror is a cloud-based DIY 360 feedback platform designed for both 360 pros and those who are new to 360 feedback.
similar_products.features:
Fast Mirror is a cloud-based DIY 360 feedback platform designed for both 360 pros and those who are new to 360 feedback. 

Easily build 360 surveys using our off-the-shelf surveys, our rich question library, or build your own from scratch. 

Translate surveys and reports into over 100 languages, instantly. Use our report widgets to build custom individual and detailed group reports. Control workflow.

Dive into our rich development planning library or create your own.

similar_products.short_desc: EchoSpan puts you in control of your employee feedback and development programs with our Flexible 360-degree feedback platform.
similar_products.features: EchoSpan's Flexible 360 feedback platform puts you in control. Every aspect of your employee feedback program is easily customizable by you, including competency models, questions, rating scales, workflows, branding, email messages and more. Start from scratch or select a professional template. EchoSpan works in more than 100 languages and serves the needs of more than 6,000 organizations worldwide. Special features are available for HR coaches and consultants. EchoSpan is fully GDPR-compliant.

similar_products.short_desc: Run impactful 360-degree feedback processes that are easy to set up, easy to complete, and beneficial for all.
similar_products.features: Implement meaningful, growth-oriented 360-degree feedback processes to enable your managers and develop your employees with Leapsome?s all-in-one people management platform. Build a culture of feedback and create a continuous cycle of performance management and personalized learning that powers employee engagement and the success of your business.

similar_products.short_desc: The human resource management solution of choice for ultimate employee feedback, performance reviews and recognition program
similar_products.features: BizMerlinHR offers a comprehensive solution for continuous performance management. Enhance your performance culture through easy-to-use performance reviews. Help employees grow through 360 feedback from self, peers, supervisors, direct reports and external collaborators. Achieve speed through configurable review templates. Better engage your workforce through feedback walls and badges. Ensure continued alignment through 1-on-1 check-Ins.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback

category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.definition: An individual's evaluation of his or her own strengths, weaknesses, and skills

category_features.definition: Assess skills, outcomes and results using preset metrics and averages

related_products.short_desc: ADP Workforce Now is a human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.
related_products.features:
The core capabilities of the solution are human resources management, payroll, benefits, talent management, compliance, time & labor management, analytics & benchmarking. 
The fully integrated suite is built on a single database, which automates data synchronization across different components and helps users to minimize manual administrative tasks. The platform also integrates with other HR and business applications via the ADP Marketplace and APIs.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Improve your HR processes by building custom workflows on monday.com for your employee performance reviews using our advanced forms.
related_products.features: Improve your HR processes by building custom workflows on monday.com for your employee performance reviews using our advanced forms. In fact, you can manage your entire employee life cycle on this flexible platform. Simply start with one of our ready-made templates and create recruitment pipelines, employee onboarding tools, and engagement surveys all with a few clicks. Then automate your workflows so you can stop working on manual work, and focus on tasks that really make a difference.

related_products.short_desc: The award-winning BambooHR Performance Management makes performance reviews a pain-free experience.
related_products.features: The award-winning BambooHR Performance Management makes performance reviews a pain-free experience by modernizing the review process and focusing on a continuous feedback approach. Discover the new way of doing Performance Management by utilizing multiple review cycles, custom questions, employee-specific goals, confidential feedback, impromptu assessments, and reporting that provides powerful, real-time insights into your top performers, struggling employees, and employee/manager misalignments.

Automated and scalable tools provide a single source of truth with common reporting, dashboards, and robust workflows. Included self-service and mobile app allow easy, anytime access.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.

Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

similar_products.features: ClearCompany is the easiest way to bring all of your employee performance review processes into a single, automated solution. ClearCompany's easy-to-use performance review software allows you to quickly set up reviews, including custom scoring tables, weighted sections, and free-form responses. ClearCompany's flat-rate pricing model allows you to send as many performance reviews as you need, as frequently as you need to, without worrying about the price tag.

similar_products.short_desc: Lattice is the way engaged, high-performing teams do performance management and appraisals to build a winning culture.
similar_products.features: Lattice integrates performance appraisals with continuous management tools into a people management platform that gives People Leaders solutions to build engaged, high-performing teams. They empower HR teams to make more strategic, data-driven decisions and build winning cultures. Find out why over 1,850+ companies trust Lattice for people management. Schedule a demo at Lattice.com.

similar_products.short_desc: From fast-growing start-ups to the Fortune 500, Culture Amp is designed to help build an employee experience your people will love.
similar_products.features: With Culture Amp, prioritize and deliver impactful programs across performance management, employee engagement, and development - all in one intuitive platform. By leveraging science-backed goal/OKR tracking, 1-on-1 templates, built-in calibrations, and 360? feedback, you can create a performance review process that supports managers and employees. Discover how 6,000+ companies, including Salesforce, Unilever, and PwC use our trusted data, tools, and partnership to build high-performing teams.

similar_products.short_desc: Performance Management Software that engages employees and embraces your organization's core values.
similar_products.features: Performance management software to help people reach their fullest potential by improving appreciation, coaching, and evaluation inside an organization.   Software features include Recognition, 9-Box Leadership Succession Tool, Goal Management, 360-Degree Feedback, Check-Ins, Engagement Surveys, and Performance Reviews.

similar_products.short_desc: bob's performance management gives you everything you need: streamlined 360-degree feedback, valuable insights, and actionable goals.
similar_products.features:
Managing performance reviews in bob generates data that provides valuable insights about your employees, managers, and your teams. This data enables you to track their progress and address any issues and concerns early.
Plus, you can easily set up new performance cycles within bob, customize them per site, and define which team members (no matter their location) will be part of the cycle.

similar_products.short_desc: The First Multi-Channel Performance Management Platform OKR for your hard to reach non-desk based employees without downloading an App.
similar_products.features:
StaffCircle provides an advanced but easy to use mobile friendly Performance Management and 360 Agile Appraisal system for any size of Organisation. 

Unify and improve 2-way Internal performance with easy and quick 360 Appraisals using mobile or web. Objectives OKR can be set by the user or Manager. Managers and users can request quick One2One Reviews. Add self Appraisals or 180, 270, 360 to your Performance Reviews and then link to Awards, Rewards or even career progression.

similar_products.short_desc: ChartHop is a new People Analytics platform, bringing disparate sources of people data together in a dynamic, visual, & actionable way.
similar_products.features:
ChartHop is a new People Analytics platform, bringing disparate sources of people data together in a dynamic, visual, & actionable way.

Unlike legacy People Analytics solutions, ChartHop is designed to be used by the whole organization. 

Now, HR and people managers alike can have the insights they need to make real-time strategic decisions about their organizations. This helps companies improve organizational health, drive alignment and accountability, and save money.

similar_products.short_desc: Define success for your organization and connect employees to your purpose with a continuous performance management tool.
similar_products.features: Ensuring that your people support your most important KPIs can be challenging. However, the right performance management software makes it easier to define success for your organization and connect employees to your mission. Cornerstone Performance provides you with tools to align your people and business strategy. Rich insights into your talent landscape allow you to quickly identify and mobilize employees for your organization's top priorities.

similar_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
similar_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mentoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mentoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mentoring software streamlines administration of corporate mentoring programs, including matching mentors to mentees, conducting surveys, and tracking mentees' progress.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.
